citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:47 pm on August
13, 2025. The inspector phoned the licensee upon arrival at the facility and left a message. The licensee called back
about 10 minutes later and said they were away and could not return to complete an inspection until 6 or 7:00 pm . Failure
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations.
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:47 pm on August 
13, 2025. The inspector phoned the licensee upon arrival at the facility and left a message. The licensee called back 
about 10 minutes later and said they were away and could not return to complete an inspection until 6 or 7:00 pm . Failure 
to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. 
Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
